name: 高等微積分（二）
restrict: ◎必須先修過【MAU0162  高等微積分（一）】
description: 深入探討微積分所需之理論，並為往後之數學分析建立紮實的基礎。
goals: 瞭解微積分的理論基礎
增進抽象理論思考能力
syllabus:
1\. Euclidean Spaces

2\. Metric Spaces

3\. Compact Sets

4\. Connected Sets

5\. Continuous Functions

  

6\. Partial Derivatives

7\. Differentiability

8\. Derivatives and Tangent Planes

9\. The Chain Rule

10 MVT and Taylor\`s Formula

11\. The Inverse Function Theorem

  

12\. Remann Integrals on R^n

13\. Iterated Integrals

14\. Change of Variable

  

15\. Curves and Oriented Curves

16\. Surfaces and Oriented Surfaces

17\. Green\`s Theorem

18\. Stoke\`s Theorem

grading.note: 於第6週及第12週舉行，分別占30%

prerequisite: ◎必須先修過【MAU0162  高等微積分（一）】
